name: aws-infra-copilot
description: Query AWS IAM, ECS, S3, and Lambda resources conversationally through Claude
long_description: An MCP server that lets you ask natural language questions about your AWS infrastructure. Supports IAM (users, roles, access keys, admin access auditing), ECS (clusters, services, tasks, task definitions), S3 (buckets, encryption, public access, object search), and Lambda (functions, deprecated runtime detection).
